name: personal-api
description: It's time to have some fun and play with the technologies you've learned in the past week. Your goal is to build a API about yourself. Your API will incorporate: * Well-documented **JSON API** Endpoints * A full set of **REST-ful Routes** (GET, POST, UPDATE, DELETE) * At least one **CRUD-able resource** (Create, Read, Update, Destroy) * and an `/api/profile` endpoint with some basic **details about you**
